TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RC2CryptoServiceProvider extends System.Security.Cryptography.RC2
Public NotInheritable Class RC2CryptoServiceProvider Inherits RC2
public ref class RC2CryptoServiceProvider sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::RC2

summary.span: 定義包裝函式物件，以存取 演算法的密碼編譯服務供應者 (CSP) 實作。

span.span: Defines a wrapper object to access the cryptographic service provider (CSP) implementation of the algorithm.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 8 位元為增量來支援從 40 位元的金鑰長度為 128 位元。The implementation supports key lengths from 40 bits to 128 bits in increments of 8 bits. 物件為區塊編碼器來加密及解密的 8 個位元組的區塊中的資料。The object is a block cipher that encrypts and decrypts data in blocks of 8 bytes. 這個類別會填補的最後一個資料區塊，如果它是不超過 8 個位元組。This class pads the final block of data if it is less than 8 bytes. 由於這個填補，加密資料的長度可能大於原始純文字。As a result of this padding, the length of encrypted data could be greater than the original plaintext. 請注意，物件不會使用 salt。Note that the object does not use salt. > [!NOTE] > 有先進加密標準 (Advanced Encryption Standard，AES) 這個較新的對稱加密演算法可供使用。A newer symmetric encryption algorithm, Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), is available. 請考慮使用演算法和其衍生的類別，而不是類別。Consider using the algorithm and its derived classes instead of the class. 使用只為了與舊版的應用程式和資料的相容性。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會加密，然後再解密字串。The following code example encrypts and then decrypts a string. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

Creates a symmetric decryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法時未指定產生的隨機金鑰。Use this method to generate a random key when none is specified. 實作 8 位元為增量來支援從 40 位元的金鑰長度為 128 位元。The implementation supports key lengths from 40 bits to 128 bits in increments of 8 bits. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會加密，然後再解密字串。The following code example encrypts and then decrypts a string. summary.span: 取得或設定一個值，此值決定了是否要建立 11 位元組長、零值 Salt 的金鑰。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to create a key with an 11-byte-long, zero-value salt.

value.span: 若要建立 11 位元組長、零值 Salt 的金鑰即為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the key should be created with an 11-byte-long, zero-value salt; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您與使用 11 位元組長、 零值的 salt 的現有應用程式交互操作。The property allows you to interoperate with an existing application that uses an 11-byte-long, zero-value salt. 大部分情況下，您不應該使用與 salt索引鍵。For most scenarios, you should not use a salt with an key. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性`true`，然後加密和解密值。The following code example sets the property to `true`, and then encrypts and decrypts a value. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider/cpp/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RC2CryptoServiceProvider/VB/example.vb#1)]
